title: Green Spirit
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Western, Fast food, Beer/Wine
description: Vegetarian bistro and cafe offering a mix of cuisines from pasta and noodles to burgers, burritos, baked as well raw cakes; has a daily menu. Drinks are draft beer (Pilsner), wine, mineral water, kombucha tea, juice, and aca√≠ cokctails made with soya and rice milk. Vegan dishes are labeled. Offers garden with view of a gothic church. Family and animal friendly atmosphere. Established fall-2014.
